song.title: Leave Her Johnny Leave Her
song.chorus: Leave her Johnny, leave her Oh leave her Johnny, leave her For the voyage is done and the winds don't blow And it's time for us to leave her
song.verse: Oh I thought I heard the old man say (Leave her Johnny, leave her) Oh it's time to come and get your pay (And it's time for us to leave her)
Now the wind blew hard and the sea rose high Oh she shipped it green and none went by
It's mahogany beef and it's weevils in your bread oh I wish old cracker hash Joe was dead
Now the maid is a bucker and the captain is a Turk and the bosun is a bastard with the middle name of work
Oh she's Paris bound and she's Paris rigged and the whole damn crew is fever-stricked
Now the rats have gone and we the crew Oh it's time by Christ that we went too
